mapper.sql: id, room_id, result, create_date, tn_id, task_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_room_result ( room_id, result, create_date, tn_id, task_id ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{result}, #{createDate}, #{tnId}, #{taskId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_room_result
room_id = #{roomId},
result = #{result},
create_date = #{createDate},
tn_id = #{tnId},
task_id = #{taskId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_room_result
room_id = #{map.roomId},
result = #{map.result},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
task_id = #{map.taskId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_room_result ( room_id, result, create_date, tn_id, task_id ) VALUES ( #{map.roomId}, #{map.result}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.tnId}, #{map.taskId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_room_result
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND room_id like CONCAT('%', #{roomId} , '%')
AND result like CONCAT('%', #{result} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
AND task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
